item.title: Shannon add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Shannon add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "One could not count the moons that shimmer on her roofs, Or the thousand splendid suns that hide behind her walls." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is a way to be good again..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "Great balls of fire. Don't bother me anymore, and don't call me sugar." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I cannot live without books." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Tucker Max
item.description: "Ladies, let me give you some advice. You can throw all your stupid fucking chick-lit, self-help, why-doesn't-he-love-me books out, because this is all you need to know: Men will treat you the way you let them. There is no such thing as "deserving" respect; you get what you demand from people.. if you demand respect, he will either respect you or he won't associate with you. It really is that simple." -- Tucker Max

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Jim Fergus
item.description: "...how odd to think of one's life not as chapters in a book but as complete volumes, separate and distinct. " -- Jim Fergus

item.title: Shannon add a quote by Jim Fergus
item.description: "Don't you know that I laugh because it is my last defense against tears? " -- Jim Fergus
